sentences.sentence: Can higher version of. NET Framework be used for project targetting lower version?
sentences.translation: 可以更高版本的。NET框架可用于项目的目标低版本？

sentences.sentence: This latest release will still support multi-targetting different versions of the .NET Framework.
sentences.translation: 最近一次发布的版本仍然支持不同版本的.NET Framework的多目标定位。

sentences.sentence: So for each platform you're targetting, you need to switch your target platform to those set of plug-ins.
sentences.translation: 所以你需要把目标平台切换到你所指定平台的一组插件上。
